data.question: What is the empirical formula of ReI(L)(CO)3(CH3CN)2-NaHPW12O40•3CH3CN•3.5H2O?
What method was used to measure the mass spectra in the study?
Is the reaction of ReI(L)(CO)3(AcCN)-MHPW12O40 with CO2 and H2 under irradiation a reversible process?
What was the yield percentage of 15-Crown-5 ether 5,6-phenanthroline (L)?
What was the purpose of using sodium hydride in the synthesis of 15-Crown-5 ether 5,6-phenanthroline (L)?
data.answer: To react with 1,10-phenanthroline-5,6-diol in dry DMF under Ar

data.question: Did the synthesis of ReI(L)(CO)3(AcCN)-MHPW12O40 involve the use of chloroform?
What was the crystal system of ReI(L)(CO)3(CH3CN)2-NaHPW12O40•3CH3CN•3.5H2O?
What was the role of Pt/C in the reaction?
Was the IR spectrum of ReI(L)(CO)3(AcCN)-MHPW12O40 measured before the reaction?
What was the purpose of adding a drop of chloroform during the crystal growth process?
data.answer: To completely dissolve the rhenium complex

data.question: Did the study involve the use of UV-vis spectroscopy?
What was the main objective of the research?
data.answer: To replace amine sacrificial donors by hydrogen in the photocatalyzed reduction of CO2 to CO and H2O
